sense.def:
The shape of something
je obris nečesa ali lik, na primer ali je nekaj okroglo ali štirikotno.

seg.quote: Bear Island is triangular in shape.
You can spin-dry this sweater and it will still retain its shape.
...a huge animal the size and shape of a rhinoceros.

sense.def:
A shape
je nekaj z natančno določeno obliko, na primer krog, štirikotnik ali trikotnik.

A shape
je tudi predmet ali oseba, ki je ne moremo razločno videti.

seg.quote: One could just distinguish a slim shape in a short white dress.

sense.def:
The shape of something
je sestava in obseg nečesa, na primer načrta ali organizacije.

seg.quote: ...developments which may alter the future course and shape of industry.

sense.def:
To shape an object
pomeni povzročiti, da dobi neki predmet določeno obliko.

seg.quote: He began to shape the dough into rolls.

sense.def:
To shape a thing or activity
pomeni povzročiti, da se neka stvar ali dejavnost razvija na določen način.

seg.quote: It was the Greeks who shaped the thinking of Western man.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
in good shape
, je v dobrem stanju ali zdrav.

Izraz
in the shape of
uporabimo, preden natančno navedemo, kaj imamo v mislih. Pred tem smo isto stvar ali pojem opisali bolj na splošno.

seg.quote: He was convinced that the end of the world was at hand in the shape of a nuclear holocaust.

sense.def:
To shape up
pomeni razvijati se na določen način.

seg.quote: The new recruits are shaping up quite well.
